Subject: Re: [junit] Junit does not release resources

Are you clearing resources in the tearDown associated with each test?

---
Stephen Smith, MEng (Wales).
http://www.stephen-smith.co.uk/

Kathey Marsden wrote:
> 
> 
> I have noticed that JUnit keeps a reference to an instance of every
> class for every fixture run, even after tests have completed. Is it
> possible to get JUnit to release test resources after the test runs?
> 
> Thanks
> 
> Kathey
